name: Dark Dragonair

abilities.name: Evolutionary Light
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for an Evolution card. Show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Dark Dragonair is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Tail Strike
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage; if tails, this attack does 20 damage.

flavorText: As is fitting for a legendary Pok√©mon, it has many strange powers, including the ability to make rain or snow fall.

strengths: Evolutionary Light searches for any Evolution card every turn
Excellent for setting up evolved Pokemon

competitiveHistory: Dark Dragonair's Evolutionary Light Pokemon Power made it one of the most valuable support Pokemon in Team Rocket. The ability to search for any Evolution card once per turn was incredibly powerful for setting up evolutions consistently. It was often used as a bench Pokemon to support evolution strategies.

rulings.ruling: Evolutionary Light can search for any Evolution card - Stage 1 or Stage 2.
You must show the Evolution card to your opponent before putting it in your hand.
